channel.title: Creating New items errors
channel.description:
Hey, I just wanted to create a few new items into my RSCPS. I added this code into ItemDef.xml: ~ In server folder then conf, server, defs, ItemDef.xml, ItemDef.xml
[code] <ItemDef> <name>Subscription Card</name> <description>Used with the subscription vendor to subscribe an account</description> <command></command> <sprite>218</sprite> <basePrice>10</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>false</wieldable> <pictureMask>16711680</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow Shield</name> <description>A square shield</description> <command></command> <sprite>3</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow Helmet</name> <description>A full face helmet</description> <command></command> <sprite>6</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow Platebody</name> <description>Provides excellent protection</description> <command></command> <sprite>8</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow Platelegs</name> <description>These look pretty heavy</description> <command></command> <sprite>9</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow battle Axe</name> <description>A vicious looking axe</description> <command></command> <sprite>84</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <name>Shadow Long Sword</name> <description>A razor sharp sword</description> <command></command> <sprite>81</sprite> <basePrice>500000</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask> </ItemDef> [/code]
This is just for harder items to get and sub cards etc. I added this code into ItemWeildableDef.Xml: ~ In server folder then conf, server, defs, extras, ItemWeildableDef.Xml
[code] <entry> <int>1315</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>99</sprite> <type>8</type> <wieldPos>3</wieldPos> <armourPoints>63</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>2</int> <int>100</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1316</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>14</sprite> <type>33</type> <wieldPos>0</wieldPos> <armourPoints>41</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>2</int> <int>100</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1317</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>29</sprite> <type>322</type> <wieldPos>1</wieldPos> <armourPoints>95</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>2</int> <int>100</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1318</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>38</sprite> <type>644</type> <wieldPos>2</wieldPos> <armourPoints>57</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>2</int> <int>100</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1319</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>110</sprite> <type>16</type> <wieldPos>4</wieldPos> <armourPoints>0</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>93</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>93</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>3</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>1</int> <int>100</int> </entry> <entry> <int>6</int> <int>50</int> </entry> <entry> <int>3</int> <int>80</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1320</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>49</sprite> <type>16</type> <wieldPos>4</wieldPos> <armourPoints>0</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>89</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>98</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>3</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>1</int> <int>100</int> </entry> <entry> <int>6</int> <int>50</int> </entry> <entry> <int>3</int> <int>80</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> [/code]
Yet when I compress and everything it goes all well except when I spawn them. When I spawn the Sub card or any Shadow item the Client box either comes out with:
[code] java.lang.NullPointerException at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.handleIncomingPacket(mudclient.java:53 52) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.checkIncomingPacket(GameWind owMiddleMan.java:281) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.sendPingPacketReadPacketData (GameWindowMiddleMan.java:213) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.processGame(mudclient.java:4138) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method2(mudclient.java:2138) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:268) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
or it comes out with:
[code] java.lang.NullPointerException at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.handleIncomingPacket(mudclient.java:53 52) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.checkIncomingPacket(GameWind owMiddleMan.java:281) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.sendPingPacketReadPacketData (GameWindowMiddleMan.java:213) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.processGame(mudclient.java:4138) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method2(mudclient.java:2138) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:268) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawInventoryMenu(mudclient.java:1212)
at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGameWindowsMenus(mudclient.java:67 27) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGame(mudclient.java:2533) at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method4(mudclient.java:860) at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:282) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
I really would like to add a higher lvl armour and higher bonus armour due to max stats being 120. It would be a bit weird having rune at lvl 120 att, str and def...

item.title: Creating New items errors
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:6, topic:419480”][quote author=dds ledg link=topic=522025.msg3795040#msg3795040 date=1319571911]

^
No, i mean did you update the .rscd /data.xml files in your client conf?

Ah, you mean Animations.rscd Right? Yeah, How would I edit that and open it?
[/quote]
Use 7zip to open it, and you will find out, also take a look at Items.rscd

Good luck![/quote]

Wow thanks so much I love you!

Read full topic

item.title: Creating New items errors
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

[quote=“dds ledg, post:5, topic:419480”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=522025.msg3795018#msg3795018 date=1319570824]
^
No, i mean did you update the .rscd /data.xml files in your client conf?
[/quote]

Ah, you mean Animations.rscd Right? Yeah, How would I edit that and open it?[/quote]
Use 7zip to open it, and you will find out, also take a look at Items.rscd

Good luck!

item.title: Creating New items errors
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

Hey, I just wanted to create a few new items into my RSCPS. I added this code into ItemDef.xml: ~ In server folder then conf, server, defs, ItemDef.xml, ItemDef.xml

  <ItemDef>
    <name>Subscription Card</name>
    <description>Used with the subscription vendor to subscribe an account</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>218</sprite>
    <basePrice>10</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>false</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>16711680</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow Shield</name>
    <description>A square shield</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>3</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow Helmet</name>
    <description>A full face helmet</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>6</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow Platebody</name>
    <description>Provides excellent protection</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>8</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow Platelegs</name>
    <description>These look pretty heavy</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>9</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow battle Axe</name>
    <description>A vicious looking axe</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>84</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
  <ItemDef>
    <name>Shadow Long Sword</name>
    <description>A razor sharp sword</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>81</sprite>
    <basePrice>500000</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>-2302756</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>

This is just for harder items to get and sub cards etc. I added this code into ItemWeildableDef.Xml: ~ In server folder then conf, server, defs, extras, ItemWeildableDef.Xml

	<entry>
		<int>1315</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>99</sprite>
			<type>8</type>
			<wieldPos>3</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>63</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>2</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>
	<entry>
		<int>1316</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>14</sprite>
			<type>33</type>
			<wieldPos>0</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>41</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>2</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>
	<entry>
		<int>1317</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>29</sprite>
			<type>322</type>
			<wieldPos>1</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>95</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>2</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>
	<entry>
		<int>1318</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>38</sprite>
			<type>644</type>
			<wieldPos>2</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>57</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>2</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>
	<entry>
		<int>1319</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>110</sprite>
			<type>16</type>
			<wieldPos>4</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>0</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>93</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>93</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>3</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>1</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
				<entry>
					<int>6</int>
					<int>50</int>
				</entry>
				<entry>
					<int>3</int>
					<int>80</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>
	<entry>
		<int>1320</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>49</sprite>
			<type>16</type>
			<wieldPos>4</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>0</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>89</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>98</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>3</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>1</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
				<entry>
					<int>1</int>
					<int>100</int>
				</entry>
				<entry>
					<int>6</int>
					<int>50</int>
				</entry>
				<entry>
					<int>3</int>
					<int>80</int>
				</entry>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>

Yet when I compress and everything it goes all well except when I spawn them. When I spawn the Sub card or any Shadow item the Client box either comes out with:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.handleIncomingPacket(mudclient.java:53
52)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.checkIncomingPacket(GameWind
owMiddleMan.java:281)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.sendPingPacketReadPacketData
(GameWindowMiddleMan.java:213)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.processGame(mudclient.java:4138)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method2(mudclient.java:2138)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:268)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

or it comes out with:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.handleIncomingPacket(mudclient.java:53
52)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.checkIncomingPacket(GameWind
owMiddleMan.java:281)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindowMiddleMan.sendPingPacketReadPacketData
(GameWindowMiddleMan.java:213)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.processGame(mudclient.java:4138)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method2(mudclient.java:2138)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:268)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawInventoryMenu(mudclient.java:1212)

        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGameWindowsMenus(mudclient.java:67
27)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGame(mudclient.java:2533)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method4(mudclient.java:860)
        at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:282)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I really would like to add a higher lvl armour and higher bonus armour due to max stats being 120. It would be a bit weird having rune at lvl 120 att, str and def…

Read full topic
